articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Remains of British journalist Dom Phillips found in Brazil, UK minister confirms - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Latin America minister Vicky Ford has confirmed the identification.
articles.content:
HUMAN REMAINS FOUND buried in the Amazon have been confirmed as those of British journalist Dom Phillips, a Foreign Office minister has said.
Forensic investigators made the identification on Friday… [+5085 chars]
